name: Vacuum (itch) (RandomServant, P0mp0n, IamnotKuki, vlaimown)
description:
Team name:

Space Vacuums
---------------------------------------------------------------

Control:

WASD - Move
Space - Jump
E - Interaction with objects
R - Restart
Esc - Pause

---------------------------------------------------------------

Parkour game in space!

The player’s task is to find out the cause of the space station crash. Why is it destroyed? Who is guilty? (You won’t know what happened because we didn’t have time to finish :) But you can write your guess in the commentary)

The game was developed as part of Epic MegaJam 2022.

---------------------------------------------------------------
Sounds were made before jam.
---------------------------------------------------------------

What version of engine did you use to create your record?

4.27.2
